typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcPocPerfilClient
source(output(
		{ID_PSSA;FL_CHURN;DT_REF_CHURN;FLG_PRTB} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcDtChurn
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcPocContestacao
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcPocConsumo
SrcPocPerfilClient, SrcDtChurn lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpDtChurn
LkpDtChurn, SrcPocContestacao lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpContestacao
LkpContestacao, SrcPocConsumo lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpConsumo
LkpConsumo sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TgtCustomerChurnData
